game.name: Instruments of Destruction
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Workshop, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Includes level editor, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 벽을 돌파하고 건물을 붕괴시키세요. Instruments of Destruction은 최신 물리 엔진에 기반한 탈것 파괴 액션 게임입니다. 130종이 넘는 탈것을 조종해서 다양한 도전으로 가득한 임무를 완수하고, 나만의 탈것을 디자인해서 고도의 상호작용이 가능한 샌드박스 세계를 박살 내세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Crash through walls and tear down buildings in Instruments of Destruction, a vehicle-action game featuring advanced physics-based demolition. Pilot 130+ unique vehicles across scores of challenge-packed missions or design your own contraptions and wreck highly-interactive sandbox worlds.
